attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British people of Great Britain are fed up with not being able to have our freedom of speech, we live in a society that is no longer ours. We have rights too,to live our lives in peace with our chosen religion.Not upset our neighbours who have their freedom of choice too. We want a safe and secure society for our children and grandchildren to be raised into. They have that right. We demand that for them all society make a stand against the present trends of not being able to have our freedom in the streets, in our everyday life and in society as a  whole Our forefathers fought for this, lets make them proud and leave the future a world to be proud of. I want to speak and walk in my own land knowing we are free.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
